items.question: What is Cloud Community Day?
items.answer: GDG Cloud communities across India organize a series of community-led events called Cloud Community Day to assist you in preparing for Google Cloud Certifications and expanding your knowledge of Cloud technologies.

items.question: What is Cloud Community Day Kolkata 2025?
items.answer: Cloud Community Day Kolkata 2025 is short form of Cloud Community Days 2025 Kolkata which is among the largest Cloud developer conferences in Eastern India.

items.question: What are GDGs?
items.answer: GDGs are focused on community building and learning about Google's technologies.

items.question: What is CCD Kolkata 2025?
items.answer: CCD Kolkata 2025 is short form of Cloud Community Days 2025 Kolkata which is among the largest Cloud developer conferences in Eastern India.

items.question: Who can register for Cloud Community Day Kolkata 2025?
items.answer: People of all levels, from beginners to experts, and anyone with a passion for learning and an interest in technology, including enthusiastic programmers, are welcome to register and attend.

items.question: Where can I find updates related to Cloud Community Day Kolkata 2025?
items.answer: All announcements related to the event are posted to the GDG Cloud Kolkata chapter mailing list which you can join by Joining the chapter at - GDG Cloud Kolkata Chapter Page. You can receive the updates by following us on Twitter (@gdgcloudkol), Facebook (@gdgcloudkol), Instagram (@gdgcloudkol) or LinkedIn (@gdgcloudkol). You can also join our Telegram group.

items.question: I want to present a talk/workshop at the conference. What should I do?
items.answer: You can submit your talk/workshop proposal on our CFS Submission.

items.question: Will I be provided travel/stay accommodation to attend the event?
items.answer: No. There is no provision for covering attendee travel/stay. For speakers, we will decide on case-by-case basis.
